item.title: To Infinity and Beyond!
item.description: I am happy to announce I am officially co-founder and CTO of Computes, inc. I couldnâ€™t be more excited to work on another startup with my partners in crime: @ChrisMatthieu, Roy van de Water, and Peter DeMartini. We are out to change the world, again! I am eager to take on the CTO role again, especially given the incredibly ambitious dreams we have for Computes. Being at the intersection of emerging technologies and high-performing teams is where I love to be.
